background.description: All devices communicate using a common <<acronym_md_lan>> protocol
A Time Source (TS) Service is on the <<acronym_md_lan>> network

scenarios.title: Device is connected to the MD LAN network with a Time Source service

specification.description: Device has detected at least one <<acronym_ts_service>>
The <<acronym_ts_service>> is operational
The device will synchronize its time with the <<acronym_ts_service>>

scenarios.title: Device is connected to the MD LAN network and a user wants to change the device's time

specification.description: Device is operational in <<acronym_md_lan>> network
The user attempts to change the time on the device manually
The device will disable the ability to change its time manually

scenarios.title: Device is connected to the MD LAN network and cannot connect to a TS Service

specification.description: Device has just connected to the <<acronym_md_lan>> network and has not detected any <<acronym_ts_service>>s
The <<acronym_ts_service>> is not operational or inaccessible
The device will not participate on the <<acronym_md_lan>> network until it detects and connects to a <<acronym_ts_service>>

scenarios.title: Devices are operational in the MD LAN network but cannot access the TS Service

specification.description: Device is operational on the <<acronym_md_lan>> network
The <<acronym_ts_service>> is no longer operational or otherwise inaccessible
The device will rely on its internal clock for time synchronization
The device will provide the accuracy of its clock in its <<acronym_mdib>>
The device will periodically attempt to reconnect to the <<acronym_ts_service>>
The device will notify the user about the fact, that the <<acronym_ts_service>> cannot be reached
The device will create a log entry noting the disconnection from the <<acronym_ts_service>>
The ability to change the device time manually will remain disabled

scenarios.title: Devices are operational in the MD LAN network but cannot access the TS Service and clock drift is unacceptable

specification.description: The <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_participant>> is operational on the <<acronym_md_lan>> network
The <<acronym_ts_service>> is no longer operational or otherwise inaccessible
The clock drift of the device internal clock exceeds an internal threshold
The timestamps of the received data are no longer accurate enough
The device will notify the user that time synchronization is no longer functional, which will limit the availability of SDC System Functionality
The device will create a log entry noting inaccurate time synchronization
The device will periodically attempt to reconnect to the <<acronym_md_lan>> and <<acronym_ts_service>>
Based on a <<term_manufacturer>>'s risk management, the device may be disconnected entirely from the <<acronym_md_lan>> network.

scenarios.title: A device, operational in the MD LAN network, determines a non-slewing time adjustment is required

specification.description: The device is operational on the <<acronym_md_lan>> network,
The device's <<term_clock_discipline_algorithm>> determines an <<term_abrupt_time_adjustment>> is required,

The device will create a log entry that includes at least a <<term_timestamp>> for the adjustment in both the <<term_time_reference_frame>> before and after the <<term_abrupt_time_adjustment>> was made,

The <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> will notify <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>>s, using its system function contributions (<<acronym_sfc>>), of the change to the provider's <<term_time_reference_frame>>,
The <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> will initiate a new MDIB sequence.

scenarios.title: A somds consumer, operational in the MD LAN network, receives data affected by an abrupt time adjustment

specification.description: The <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> is operational on the <<acronym_md_lan>> network,

The <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> receives notifications and/or <<acronym_mdib>> state indicating a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> has made abrupt time adjustment to its device clock,
The <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> will notify next users of data of suspicious timestamps.

background.description: All devices communicate using a common <<acronym_md_lan>> protocol
Devices in the room have already been assigned to the <<system_type_dashboard>>

scenarios.title: Devices are Accessible to the Dashboard

specification.description: Dashboard has detected at least one assigned accessible ICU device
the ICU devices are communicating on the <<acronym_md_lan>>
the <<system_type_dashboard>> will display parameter, waveform, alarm, setting, imagine, etc. information from all assigned accessible devices

scenarios.title: ICU Devices are Inaccessible to the Dashboard

specification.description: Dashboard cannot detect any assigned accessible ICU devices
the <<system_type_dashboard>> will display an error message

scenarios.title: One or more ICU devices become Inaccessible to the Dashboard

specification.description: <<system_type_dashboard>> cannot detect a previously detected assigned ICU device
the <<system_type_dashboard>> will display an error message
